> ## Learning Objectives
>
> * Learn what the shell and why you would want to use it.
> * Learn about "standard input" and "standard output"
> * In the shell, learn how to:
>   * Navigate
>   * Organize files
>   * Examine files in the shell
>   * Manage input and output streams
> * Bonus: Learn how to submit a shell script as a job at OSC
